parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "Mircea Geoana,"  who, while not explicitly stated as a candidate in this specific post, is strongly associated with PRA (Partidul România în Acțiune) and is likely a candidate for the parliamentary elections.  The hashtag #Alegeri2024 further reinforces this connection to the 2024 parliamentary elections.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The post's public nature on Facebook and the specified reach (100K-500K) confirm its intention to address a large segment of the population.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post's primary objective appears to be promoting Mircea Geoana and, by extension, the PRA party.  The phrasing "Mircea Geoana susține Partidul România în Acțiune!" ("Mircea Geoana supports the Party Romania in Action!") directly advocates for the party. The use of hashtags related to the elections (#Alegeri2024) further strengthens this conclusion. The post aims to influence voters to consider or support PRA.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It's not presenting objective information or analysis but rather a clear endorsement of a political figure and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The statement is not a personal opinion; it's a direct political endorsement presented as a paid advertisement.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>362052060301427</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Partidul România în Acțiune Mehedinți, promotes Mircea Geoana and, by implication, the PRA party.  The post's explicit endorsement, targeting a wide audience, and the use of election-related hashtags strongly suggest an intention to influence voters in favor of PRA.  While the post doesn't explicitly call for a vote, its supportive message and the context of the election campaign make it a clear form of electoral propaganda. The fact that the post was published after the official campaign period ended further strengthens the case for a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Mircea Geoana</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PRA</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Partidul Rom\u00e2nia \u00een Ac\u021biune Mehedinți, pentru \u00eencalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, dup\u0103 ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei post\u0103ri p\u0103 Facebook (ID 362052060301427) cu caracter de propagand\u0103 electoral\u0103, care promoveaz\u0103 explicit pe Mircea Geoana \u021fi, implicit, Partidul Rom\u00e2nia \u00een Ac\u021biune. Postarea, pl\u0103tit\u0103 \u021fi cu o raz\u0103 de cuprindere estimat\u0103 la 100.000-500.000 de persoane, conține mesajul "Mircea Geoana susține Partidul Rom\u00e2nia \u00een Ac\u021biune!", \u00eensoțit de hashtag-ul #Alegeri2024, av\u00e2nd drept efect electoral influențarea votului \u00een favoarea PRA.  Aceast\u0103 acțiune constituie propagand\u0103 electoral\u0103 interzis\u0103 dup\u0103 \u00eencheierea campaniei electorale, conform articolului 98 t).  Cheltuielile de publicitate se situeaz\u0103 \u00eentre 1.000 \u021fi 1.500 RON, conform informațiilor din Ad Library.  Datele de contact ale Partidului Rom\u00e2nia \u00een Ac\u021biune Mehedinți sunt disponibile pe pagina lor de Facebook.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
